title: Home Explore by Category: solid minimal black-and-white icons

requirements.summary: Replace Home “Explore by Category” sub-icons with a consistent solid/filled, minimal black-and-white icon set while preserving the existing grid/card layout and copy.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the “Explore by Category” section renders the same grid layout as before (same column behavior, card structure, spacing, and typography).
All category icons appear as solid/filled, minimal, and consistent in style (no mixed outline vs solid styles).
Icons use a black-and-white presentation consistent with the luxury theme (no colored accents for the icon glyphs).
No other Home page sections (Hero, Featured Stories, About, Newsletter) or other routes/pages are visually or functionally changed.

file_operations.description: Remove the current mixed-outline lucide-react icons and replace them with a cohesive set of solid/filled minimal SVG icon components (e.g., local React components in this file) mapped 1:1 to the existing categories; update only icon-related styling to use black-and-white (e.g., text-foreground / bg-foreground opacity) while keeping the existing grid/card structure, spacing, category count/order, and text content unchanged.
